item.title: Pumpkin Latte Beer and Ace Pumpkin Cider
item.description:
<img src="https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4580/38604886832_7bc4b06488_z.jpg" alt="Coffee, Pumpkin Pie, and Pumpkin Latte Beer">
<figcaption class="wp-caption-text">Coffee, Pumpkin Pie, and Pumpkin Latte Beer — Photo by <a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/tobyjmarks/">Tobyblog</a> on <a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/tobyjmarks/38604886832/" title="Coffee, Pumpkin Pie, and Pumpkin Latte Beer">Flickr</a></figcaption>

This year while out shopping for turkey and wine, I discovered a couple of very fallish, and very Thanksgiving-appropriate beverages I thought I'd share with you all. One is a new seasonal coffee brew from my favorite DFW brewery Martin House, and the other is a special cider I haven't seen in three years — Ace's own extraordinary Pumpkin Cider. Read on!
